title: A Big coconut land just peep distance to beach for sale
details:
218 perches big land side land with very big classic house. The beach seen from the house compound. If any Build a two or more storied building the beach panaroma is excellent.
Traditional well water and pipe borne water. All amenities . Just behind the beach of ahangama town.
Walking distance to ahangama railway station,supermarket, bus stand.
An ideal for a build big hotel complex or any tourist purpose. Even ideal for a bid shopping complex or apparent complex.
Direct access. Clear deeds.
NB:
Property inspection only prior appointment with our real estate agent Mr. Gallage on
0778354380
